name: GroupFMG
tag_list: media, advertising, e-commerce, digital, marketing, content, agency, creative, print, production
overview:
Group FMG is a high-impact marketing solutions company that helps global brands adapt to the new digital environment with creative design, thinking and compelling content that works across all channels. It underpins all of its solutions with differentiated technology, domain skills, analytical insights and flexible cost models.

The company has produced award-winning marketing campaigns across multiple platforms including: print, interactive magazines, e-books, catalogues, e-commerce solutions, digital shop fronts, portals, websites, videos and loyalty programs. Fortune 1000 clients include, Sears, Staples, Disney, IBM, Pepsi Max, Peugeot, Hearst, Harper Collins and Yahoo.

Group FMG is headquartered in New York, with additional offices in London, Bangalore and Chennai. Group FMG is funded by India Value Fund Advisors (IVFA), a leading private equity fund, and Zodius Capitol a growth capital and build-out company.

offices.address1: 2nd Floor, Hardy Tower Ramanujan IT SEZ

external_links.title: Group FMG Opens State-of-the-Art Global Operations and Technology Center of Excellence (COE) in Chennai, India
